meanings.definition: The quality or state of being gooey.
meanings.sent1: The gooeyness of the melted chocolate made it perfect for dipping strawberries.
meanings.sent2: I love the gooeyness of marshmallows when they are roasted over a campfire.
meanings.sent3: The gooeyness of the slime toy entertained the kids for hours.
meanings.sent4: Her words were coated in a gooeyness that made them hard to forget.
meanings.sent5: The gooeyness of the caramel oozed out of the candy bar.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being sticky or viscous.
meanings.sent1: The gooeyness of the glue made it difficult to separate the papers.
meanings.sent2: The gooeyness of the honey made it a perfect natural sweetener.
meanings.sent3: The gooeyness of the tape caused it to stick to everything it touched.
meanings.sent4: The gooeyness of the sap on the tree trunk glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The gooeyness of the syrup slowly dripped down the stack of pancakes.

meanings.definition: The tendency to be soft and adhesive.
meanings.sent1: The gooeyness of the dough made it challenging to shape into cookies.
meanings.sent2: The gooeyness of the mud made it hard for the hikers to walk through.
meanings.sent3: The gooeyness of the tape caused it to stick to everything it touched.
meanings.sent4: The gooeyness of the melted cheese held the sandwich together.
meanings.sent5: The gooeyness of the bubblegum made it fun to blow bubbles.
